full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN MA GCIG ZHI KHRO LA BRTEN PA'I SBYANG CHOG SHIN TU BSDUS PA MKHA' SPYOD MYUR LAM ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES RJE BTZUN MA GCIG ZHI KHRO LA BRTEN PA'I SBYAR CHOG SHIN TU BSDUS PA MKHA' SPYOD MYUR LAM ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI MKHAN MING BSAM GRUB BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS SO, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN GYI DON RGYA CHEN PO BYED PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
